verbs.description: On his [ARGM-LOC: nationally] [V: syndicated] [ARG1: radio talk show] Wednesday , host Mark Levin interviewed former federal prosecutor Andrew McCarthy on the topic of Special Counsel Robert Mueller ’s threat to subpoena and interview President Donald J. Trump , McCarthy suggesting that Mueller should not be permitted to subpoena Trump , nor even ask for an interview .
